content: जाल्म {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ल्मी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Cruel, severe, harsh. {@--2@} Rash, inconsiderate. --ल्मः (ल्मी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} A rogue, rascal, villain, wretch, miscreant; अपि ज्ञायते कतमेन दिग्भागेन ग तः स जाल्म इति <ls>V. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A poor man, a low or degraded man. {@--3@} One who reads or recites badly; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>P. VI. 2. 158.</ls>
